trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bellevue
There were no other sightings in Bellevue on or around May 5th 1981
divs: sighting detailswhile driving o a bowling alley i noted a ufo overhead. the car stopped and there was silence. as i attempted to look out the window a bright yellow\green light shone down forcing me to withdraw my attempts t look up. i could see an irregular edge which appeared to show the craft to be about the size of a city block as is blocked out the stars. i felt a sense that someone\something was contacting me telepathically. it was a conversation asking me if i wanted to go with "them". i responded no, that i was a poor choice as i had several medical issues and family psychological issues. this appeared to end the connection and just as suddenly as it appeared it disappeared. i was going to arrive late to the bowling league so i was concerned that my team mates would require an explanation instead i arrived early by about 20 minutes. somehow i had gained about 45 minutes. i have no physical marks or indications of physical contact. i don't have any "lost time" from this incident. one of my co-workers at the hospital remarked that he had seen in and was disturbed that i was uncomfortable talking about it when i explained that i didn't want him to think i was trying to "steal his thunder". i have talked about some aspects of this with a couple of people but never told all of it.
Summary: Driving to Bowling alley when overhad UFO hovered and cntacted ein car telepthically
